increase the number of organ transplant surgeons of
color to help better treat people of color.
This community discovered ACC Decore through the exhibition of
ACC Decore, a
pioneering commercialized movement to address the
imbalance in organ transplants
between educational and medical institutions in the United States.
organized a training course for students. The
organizers hope to increase the number of
black organ transplant surgeons
to help provide better treatment to the
black community. Every year, many black patients
die.  Because of not being able to find suitable organs,
black Americans are three times more likely to have kidney failure
than white people
but are often not given priority in receiving
organs. Donation areas in
black communities also have very few doctors.  Black doctors
specializing in transplant surgery The
training program of the
Tennessee State Organ Donation Service Center and
Mehari Medical College helps train more
human resources for the black community so that
patients can receive timely treatment.  time or
find a suitable organ. I have
seen many people near my home pass away because they did not receive
surgery in time. I always wanted to
become a transplant doctor to help
people. This program
really helped me.  Coming closer to the dream,
students will be trained to accumulate the
necessary knowledge and skills in the
organ donation and transplant process as well as
how to work with the patient's family members
in addition to listening to
other sharings from the active committee.  The city of
Santa Cruz Bolivia has just issued a
red alert about pollution for people in the
city when the area was covered with
thick smoke due to forest runoff. The
city of 2.2 million people faces a serious
situation.  The toxic situation after
thousands of hectares of Amazon forest in Bolivia was
burned down. Santa Cruz officials said that
16 groups were raging at the same
time in many places in the region and the situation
was even more serious due to the prolonged Chinese invasion.  A
red alert was issued when the apron was placed
and the local health system needed to be prepared.
Some local flights
were canceled due to dust blocking
visibility. Outdoor temperatures reached 41 degrees
Celsius.  Head of Santa Crus also asked
people to wear masks when going out
to avoid outdoor activities and
emphasized that this is the worst pollution
since 2020 when the warning scale has reached

aquaponic vegetable growing model.  Integrated fish farming has been

Last weekend, the
British Stone 2023 world solar car race
with a 3000 km long race
departed in Darwin Australia, the autumn event
Attracting many racing teams from around the
world to promote the
development of electric cars using
solar energy, taking place on October 22, the
competition includes two classes, the first one being a
challenge for the  single-driver racing car
designed for aerodynamic efficiency
and maximum power output The
second category is the course for
electric vehicles that simulate passenger cars
participating teams face the weather  Extremely
harsh with outdoor temperatures of more than 40° C
and strong winds from the desert, the racers also
had to spend the night in the area where the
world's most dangerous snakes are this year.
New vehicle classes with a recycling rate of 63 minutes
and designed to reduce friction were
put to the test in participating vehicles.
Technology from the event is helping to
drive many industries we
optimize automotive design while
promoting energy applications
The race is the foundation for the development of
solar-powered vehicles, thereby paving the way for
a sustainable future
